body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, tailor. Virginia native. Married to Dorcus Pearce. Father of Mildred Pearce, Morgan B. Pearce, James W. Pearce, Amanda Pearce. Tailor in Henry County in 1850. Owner of three enslaved persons in 1850. Tailor in Henry County in 1860. Owned four enslaved persons in 1860. Postmaster in Henry County from April 18, 1863.
